entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero except plus 4 near the Alberta border.
